item.title: What Is Containerization?
item.description: Containerization is a process of packaging software application with its operating environment as a bundle through Virtualization. The containers running through virtualization are hardware agnostic and portable.

item.title: How To Set Up Git Workflow For Web Application Deployment
item.description: Git is popular tool among developers. Itâ€™s mainly used to track changes in code through out the development process. But there is a hidden feature in it called Git hooks, through which we can run scripts when a specific event is triggered in a Git repository. One of these events is called Post-Receive.
